DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect overall glycaemic control two insulin intensification therapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Insulin Intensification Therapies Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Present type 2 diabetes mellitus Have receive twicedaily premixed insulin therapy without metformin and/or alphaglucosidase inhibitor , least six month prior study entry Have Haemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) > 7.0 % < 12.0 % Within last 3 month prior entry study , take nonpermitted glucoselowering agent , take nonpermitted oral antihyperglycaemic medication Are pregnant intend become pregnant course study , sexually active woman childbearing potential actively practice birth control method determine investigator medically acceptable . Are woman breastfeed . Have irregular sleep/wake cycle ( example , participant sleep day work night ) . Do regularly consume three meal per day . Have body mass index > 35 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m^2 ) . Have one episode severe hypoglycaemia within 24 week prior entry study . Have cardiac disease functional status Class III IV Have history renal liver disease Have use less equal 20 Units per day ( U/day ) insulin past 90 day 14 day ( accumulate ) .
